author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Guangzhou Automobile Expects FY Net Profit Attributable To Rise By RMB3.4 Bln-RMB4.6 Bln (Jan 15)
text:
(Corrects headline in Jan 15 item)
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Guangzhou Automobile Group Co Ltd :
* NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS EXPECTED TO INCREASE BY RMB3,350 MILLION TO RMB4,570 MILLION AND BY 55 PCT TO 75 PCT FOR FY 2017
* EXPECTED RESULT‍ DUE TO GROWTH OF PRINCIPAL BUSINESS OF CO​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
